chunk:
Herbaliz Lotion, Rose

Brand: Herbaliz

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa Damascena (Bulgarian Rose) Water, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula)*, Plantago Major (Plantain)*, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Rose Hips Seed Oil*, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil*,

(Calendula)*, Plantago Major (Plantain)*, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Rose Hips Seed Oil*, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil*, Tocopherol, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Oil. *Certified Organic

Directions: Pour or pump into clean cupped hand. A little goes a long way.

Warnings: No preservatives. Store away from heat or sun. Use within 6 months of purchase. Not for internal use. Keep out of eyes. Rare individuals with both a Type B latex allergy and a nut allergy can react to shea butter.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
